Introduction

Hwang Woo Lim or simply Woolim is a South Korean singer, model and actress under Lean Branding. She is a former member of the girl group Playback and the project girl group The Pink Lady.She made her solo debut on June 21, 2022 with the digital single "My Dummy Darling".
